019package org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events;
020
021import org.jdrupes.json.JsonRpc;
022import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
023import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
024import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
025
026/**
027 * A JSON notification from the web console view (browser) to the web console. 
028 */
029public class JsonInput extends Event<Void> {
030
031    private final JsonRpc request;
032
033    /**
034     * Create a new request from the given data.
035     * 
036     * @param request a request as defined by the JSON RPC specification 
037     */
038    public JsonInput(JsonRpc request) {
039        this.request = request;
040    }
041
042    public JsonRpc request() {
043        return request;
044    }
045
046    /*
047     * (non-Javadoc)
048     * 
049     * @see java.lang.Object#toString()
050     */
051    @Override
052    public String toString() {
053        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(50);
054        builder.append(Components.objectName(this))
055            .append(" [");
056        if (request().method() != null) {
057            builder.append("method=")
058                .append(request().method())
059                .append(", ");
060        }
061        if (request().id().isPresent()) {
062            builder.append("id=")
063                .append(request().id().get());
064        }
065        if (channels() != null) {
066            builder.append("channels=")
067                .append(Channel.toString(channels()));
068        }
069        builder.append(']');
070        return builder.toString();
071    }
072}
